job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad/Early Career - New York, San Francisco, Toronto
job.description: databases are the beating heart of every business in the worldltbrgtltbrgtcockroach labs is the creator of cockroachdb the most highly evolved cloudnative distributed sql database on the planet that scales fast survives anything and thrives anywhere we created cockroachdb to unshackle teams from the constraints of their database join us on our mission to enable every developer to build worldchanging applicationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout the roleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are looking for extraordinary backend fullstack and frontend engineers to join our teamltbrgtltbrgtyou willltbrgtltulgtltligtdesign code and test across our distributed database cockroachdb or our databaseasaservice cockroachcloud you bring your expertise to the table to help us build the best database for our users partners and customersltligtltligtcollaborate with designers and engineers both inhouse and in our open source community to design implement and integrate new features and tools into cockroachdbltligtltligtimprove the performance of cockroachdb or cockroachcloudltligtltligtmake sure that our products stay scalable survivable and consistent as we continue to grow as a companyltbrgtltligtltulgtthe expectationsltbrgtltbrgtin your first days you will become an integrated member of our engineering team we believe that its essential for you to take this first month to become familiar with our technology and our companyltbrgtltbrgtafter months youll be integrated into the team you will be comfortable contributing to the codebase for cockroachdb or cockroachcloud you will begin to determine the parts of our product that most interest you and work with your manager to focus your efforts on projects that align with those areas and the product roadmapltbrgtltbrgtas our team grows you will have the opportunity to shape the direction of development for cockroach labs products we want our users to have a phenomenal experience using our products and you play a crucial role in making our database offerings a joy to useltbrgtltbrgtyou haveltbrgtltulgtltligtbeen pursuing or recently completed studies in computer science or related technical field graduating between december and august ltligtltligta passion working on complex technical products and have exposure to distributed systems concurrency control data replication file systems or sql processingltligtltligtcomfort using programming languages like javascript react redux go cc java and pythondjango we use reactjs redux and typescript on the client side and use go on the server side if you dont know any of these languages youll learn them while youre hereltligtltligta love for building relationships with your colleagues you enjoy being part of the code review process and partnering with your teammates on challenging problemsltligtltligtpast experience working on productionlevel codeltligtltligtgenuine interest in cockroach labs mission and are excited to use cockroachdb in your projectsltligtltligtbonus points if you were a ta or head ta for a cs courseltbrgtltligtltulgtnote our interview process consists largely of programming in a real environment and well be evaluating you on the skills listed aboveltbrgtltbrgtthe teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin addition you will get to work closely with the senior leadership includingltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtyou will have the opportunity to report to a member of our engineering leadership team based on the project you work on at cockroach labsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtpeter mattis cofounder and chief technology officerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtpeter works on a bit of everything from lowlevel optimization of code to refining the overall design he was thrust into file systems early in his career at inktomi and then learned the true meaning of scalability while working on gmail and colossus at google before stepping into the office in the morning he will have nursed his crossfit addiction and dealt with the chaos of a three kid morning routine you can set your watch by his daily departure at pm to have dinner with his familyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtisaac wong vp of engineeringltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtisaac is responsible for the health of the engineering organization at cockroach labs he partners closely with teams to ensure we have a balanced culture that promotes quality and innovation in pursuit of our goals before joining cockroach labs isaac was in life sciences for years with medidata solutions where he had a front row seat on the exciting ride from a person startup to more than people worldwide but the lure of distributed resilient and consistent sql databases along with the amazing technology and culture at cockroach labs proved too much when not working he likes to draw play the piano and search nyc for cannolis with his wife and kidsltbrgtltbrgtour benefitsltbrgtltulgtltligt health insurance coverage for you and your dependentsltligtltligtfertility and family planning coverageltligtltligtpaid parental leave with baby bucksltligtltligtflex fridaysltligtltligtflexible time off ampamp flexible hoursltligtltligteducation reimbursementltligtltligtrelocation supportltbrgtltligtltulgtcockroach labs is proud to be an equal opportunity employer building a diverse and inclusive workforce if you need additional accommodations to feel comfortable during your interview process please email us at accessibilitycockroachlabscom
